entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
